bouncy.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a bouncy ball etc quickly moves away from a surface after it has hit it
bouncy.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a bouncy surface is made of a substance that makes people move up and down when they are on it
bouncy.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The new bed is nice and bouncy.
bouncy.translation[0].definitions[2].def: someone who is bouncy is always very happy, confident, and full of energy
bouncy.translation[0].definitions[3].def: hair or material that is bouncy goes back to its shape when you press it
